invoiceSeries.title: Invoice Series
invoiceSeries.description: Configure series for numbering your invoices. Format: Prefix + Year (2 digits) + Sequential number.
invoiceSeries.name: Name *
invoiceSeries.noSeriesHint: Create a series to start numbering your invoices
invoiceSeries.note: Note: The current number is the last assigned number. The next invoice will use the following number. You can edit the current number to adjust numbering (e.g.: set 0 to start from 1, or 269 so the next one is 270).

emptyState.title: You have no apartments
emptyState.description: Create your first apartment or group to get started.

groupInfo.title: What is a group?
groupInfo.description: A group bundles several apartments from the same owner for combined invoicing in a single monthly settlement.
groupInfo.benefit2: Breakdown by apartment in the PDF

modals.deleteGroupConfirm: Delete this group? The apartments will become standalone.

form.name: Name
form.inheritsFromGroup: Inherits owner and configuration from the group
form.groupsExplanation: Groups allow you to bundle apartments from the same owner for combined invoicing.
form.groupsAllowGrouping: Groups allow you to bundle apartments from the same owner.
form.allUnitsInvoiceToOwner: All apartments in the group are invoiced to this owner
form.cleaningHintGroup: If the apartments in this group have different cleaning prices, set the price on each apartment individually. It will be applied automatically in settlements and invoicing.
form.cleaningHintUnit: This price overrides the group price. If you enter a specific cleaning fee when creating a reservation, that takes highest priority.
form.overrideGroupHint: If you fill these values, they will override the group settings for this apartment.
form.platformNamesHint: If the platform name is different from the internal name, add it here so imported reservations are automatically assigned.
form.platformNamesHintShort: These names are used to automatically assign reservations when importing CSV
form.airbnbPlaceholder: Airbnb name (separate with commas if multiple)
form.bookingPlaceholder: Booking name (separate with commas if multiple)
form.vrboPlaceholder: Vrbo name (separate with commas if multiple)

modal.name: Name
modal.groupsHelp: Groups allow you to bundle apartments from the same owner for combined invoicing.
modal.platformNamesHelp: If the platform name is different from the internal name, add it here so imported reservations are automatically assigned.
modal.csvImportHelp: These names are used to automatically assign reservations when importing CSV
modal.allUnitsInvoicedToOwner: All apartments in the group are invoiced to this owner
modal.groupExplanation: A group bundles several apartments from the same owner for combined invoicing in a single monthly settlement.
